verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: granted] [ARG1: a pardon for former Arizona sheriff Joe Arpaio , who was convicted of ignoring a judge 's order to not detain undocumented immigrants] .
President Trump granted a pardon for former Arizona sheriff Joe Arpaio , who [V: was] convicted of ignoring a judge 's order to not detain undocumented immigrants .
President Trump granted a pardon for [ARG1: former Arizona sheriff Joe Arpaio] , [R-ARG1: who] was [V: convicted] [ARG2: of ignoring a judge 's order to not detain undocumented immigrants] .
President Trump granted a pardon for former Arizona sheriff Joe Arpaio , [ARG0: who] was convicted of [V: ignoring] [ARG1: a judge 's order to not detain undocumented immigrants] .
President Trump granted a pardon for former Arizona sheriff Joe Arpaio , [ARG0: who] was convicted of ignoring a judge 's order to [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: detain] [ARG1: undocumented immigrants] .
